definition: to fasten/to button/button/buckle/knot/to arrest/to confiscate/to deduct (money)/discount/to knock/to smash, spike or dunk (a ball)/to cover (with a bowl etc)/(fig.) to tag a label on sb/(Tw) (loanword) code
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
erhua variant of 釦眼|扣眼[kou4 yan3]

sentences.english: Lace-up closure with metal eyelets for a secure fit.
sentences.chinese: 花边关闭一个安全合适的金属扣眼。

sentences.english: The end of the shock cord is sewn inside the lower grommet .
sentences.chinese: 绳子的末端是缝在低的那个扣眼里面的。

sentences.english: A cord that is drawn through eyelets or around hooks in order to draw together two edges.
sentences.chinese: 一种透过扣眼或吊钩将两边拉在一起的绳索。

sentences.english: Front lace-up closure with metal eyelets.
sentences.chinese: 前关闭花边与金属扣眼。

sentences.english: A total of 16 grommets are required for the seat.
sentences.chinese: 一个扣眼共16个座位都需要。

sentences.english: Traditional lace-up closure with metal eyelets for a secure, customized fit.
sentences.chinese: 传统的花边与安全，定制适合的金属扣眼关闭。

sentences.english: Grommet cinch closure with long tassels.
sentences.chinese: 扣眼长流苏不在话下封闭。

sentences.english: It had grummets and was laced down at the edge with cord.
sentences.chinese: 帆布边沿上有扣眼，用绳子穿过绑着。

sentences.english: The balance of a buttonhole and stitch are badly adjusted.
sentences.chinese: 扣眼和针的平衡关系被很大程度的调整过。
前面的花边与金属扣眼。

definition: variant of 紐扣|纽扣[niu3 kou4]
erhua variant of 釦眼|扣眼[kou4 yan3]
a buckle or fastener for clothing that does not use a button and buttonhole (e.g. the buckle on metal wristwatches)
hidden snap fastener (concealed behind a flap on a garment)
